      <tr>
        <td id="L68" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="68"></td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="416"></td>
        <td id="LC416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Marge’s Big Mistake </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="417"></td>
        <td id="LC417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="418"></td>
        <td id="LC418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry went down to breakfast the next morning to find the three Dursleys already sitting around </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="419"></td>
        <td id="LC419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the kitchen table. They were watching a brand-new television, a welcome-home-for-the-summer </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="420"></td>
        <td id="LC420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present for Dudley, who had been complaining loudly about the long walk between the fridge </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="421"></td>
        <td id="LC421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the television in the living room. Dudley had spent most of the summer in the kitchen, his </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="422"></td>
        <td id="LC422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">piggy little eyes fixed on the screen and his five chins wobbling as he ate continually. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="423"></td>
        <td id="LC423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="424"></td>
        <td id="LC424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry sat down between Dudley and Uncle Vernon, a large, beefy man with very little neck and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="425"></td>
        <td id="LC425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a lot of mustache. Far from wishing Harry a happy birthday, none of the Dursleys made any sign </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="426"></td>
        <td id="LC426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they had noticed Harry enter the room, but Harry was far too used to this to care. He helped </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="427"></td>
        <td id="LC427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself to a piece of toast and then looked up at the reporter on the television, who was halfway </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="428"></td>
        <td id="LC428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through a report on an escaped convict. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="429"></td>
        <td id="LC429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="430"></td>
        <td id="LC430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“. . . the public is warned that Black is armed and extremely dangerous. A special hot line has </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="431"></td>
        <td id="LC431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been set up, and any sighting of Black should be reported immediately.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="432"></td>
        <td id="LC432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="433"></td>
        <td id="LC433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No need to tell us he ’s no good,” snorted Uncle Vernon, staring over the top of his newspaper at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="434"></td>
        <td id="LC434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the prisoner. “Look at the state of him, the filthy layabout! Look at his hair!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="435"></td>
        <td id="LC435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="436"></td>
        <td id="LC436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He shot a nasty look sideways at Harry, whose untidy hair had always been a source of great </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="437"></td>
        <td id="LC437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">annoyance to Uncle Vernon. Compared to the man on the television, however, whose gaunt face </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="438"></td>
        <td id="LC438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was surrounded by a matted, elbow-length tangle, Harry felt very well groomed indeed. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="439"></td>
        <td id="LC439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="440"></td>
        <td id="LC440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reporter had reappeared. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="441"></td>
        <td id="LC441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="442"></td>
        <td id="LC442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries will announce today — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="443"></td>
        <td id="LC443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="444"></td>
        <td id="LC444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hang on!” barked Uncle Vernon, staring furiously at the reporter. “You didn’t tell us where that </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="445"></td>
        <td id="LC445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maniac’s escaped from! What use is that? Lunatic could be coming up the street right now!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="446"></td>
        <td id="LC446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="447"></td>
        <td id="LC447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Petunia, who was bony and horse-faced, whipped around and peered intently out of the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="448"></td>
        <td id="LC448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kitchen window. Harry knew Aunt Petunia would simply love to be the one to call the hot line </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="449"></td>
        <td id="LC449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number. She was the nosiest woman in the world and spent most of her life spying on the boring, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="450"></td>
        <td id="LC450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">law-abiding neighbors. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="451"></td>
        <td id="LC451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="452"></td>
        <td id="LC452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When will they learn,” said Uncle Vernon, pounding the table with his large purple fist, “that </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="549"></td>
        <td id="LC549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was pleased to hear a definite note of panic in Uncle Vernon’s voice. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="550"></td>

        <td id="LC637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By the time he got back to the kitchen, Aunt Marge had been supplied with tea and fruitcake, and </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="638"></td>
        <td id="LC638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ripper was lapping noisily in the corner. Harry saw Aunt Petunia wince slightly as specks of tea </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="639"></td>
        <td id="LC639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and drool flecked her clean floor. Aunt Petunia hated animals. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="640"></td>
        <td id="LC640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="641"></td>
        <td id="LC641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Who’s looking after the other dogs, Marge?” Uncle Vernon asked. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="642"></td>
        <td id="LC642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="643"></td>
        <td id="LC643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, I’ve got Colonel Fubster managing them,” boomed Aunt Marge. “He’s retired now, good </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="644"></td>
        <td id="LC644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for him to have something to do. But I couldn’t leave poor old Ripper. He pines if he’s away </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry was still an underage wizard, and he was forbidden by wizard law to do magic outside </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that had stated quite clearly that if the Ministry got wind of any more magic in Privet Drive, </td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="929"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1209"></td>
        <td id="LC1209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1210"></td>

        <td id="LC1212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry looked up at the owner of the hand on his shoulder and felt a bucketful of ice cascade into </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1213"></td>
        <td id="LC1213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his stomach — he had walked right into Cornelius Fudge, the Minister of Magic himself. </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1303"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC1394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry followed Tom up a handsome wooden staircase to a door with a brass number eleven on it, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>
        <td id="LC1395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which Tom unlocked and opened for him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1396"></td>
        <td id="LC1396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>
        <td id="LC1397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Inside was a very comfortable-looking bed, some highly polished oak furniture, a cheerfully </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crackling fire and, perched on top of the wardrobe — </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>
        <td id="LC1400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hedwig!” Harry gasped. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1401"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>
        <td id="LC1428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It took Harry several days to get used to his strange new freedom. Never before had he been able </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1429"></td>
        <td id="LC1429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to get up whenever he wanted or eat whatever he fancied. He could even go wherever he pleased, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1430"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1432"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1434"></td>
        <td id="LC1434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry ate breakfast each morning in the Leaky Cauldron, where he liked watching the other </td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1455"></td>

        <td id="L1457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1457"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1462"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Curious to know what the crowd in the shop was staring at, Harry edged his way inside and </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1464"></td>

        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>
        <td id="LC1478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A large witch in front of Harry moved, and he was able to read the sign next to the broom: </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1479"></td>
        <td id="LC1479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1480"></td>
        <td id="LC1480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">** THE FIREBOLT ** </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1481"></td>
        <td id="LC1481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1482"></td>
        <td id="LC1482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THIS STATE-OF-THE-ART RACING BROOM SPORTS A STREAM-LINED, SUPERFINE </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1483"></td>
        <td id="LC1483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">HANDLE OF ASH, TREATED WITH A DIAMOND-HARD POLISH AND HAND- </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1484"></td>
        <td id="LC1484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">NUMBERED WITH ITS OWN REGISTRATION NUMBER. EACH INDIVIDUALLY </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1485"></td>
        <td id="LC1485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SELECTED BIRCH TWIG IN THE BROOMTAIL HAS BEEN HONED TO </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1486"></td>
        <td id="LC1486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AERODYNAMIC PERFECTION, GIVING THE FIREBOLT UNSURPASSABLE BALANCE </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1487"></td>
        <td id="LC1487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AND PINPOINT PRECISION. THE FIREBOLT HAS AN ACCELERATION OF 150 MILES </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1488"></td>
        <td id="LC1488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AN HOUR IN TEN SECONDS AND INCORPORATES AN UNBREAKABLE BRAKING </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They made their way back up the crowded street to the Magical Menagerie. As they reached it, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>
        <td id="LC1766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione came out, but she wasn’t carrying an owl. Her anns were clamped tightly around the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Unbidden, the image of the beast in the shadows of Magnolia Crescent crossed his mind. What to </td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>

        <td id="L2708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2708"></td>
        <td id="LC2708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The door into the Great Hall stood open at the right; Harry followed the crowd toward it, but had </td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2806"></td>
        <td id="LC2806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Dumbledore, though very old, always gave an impression of great energy. He had </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2808"></td>

        <td id="L2887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2887"></td>
        <td id="LC2887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dumbledore gave the word that it was time for them all to go to bed, and they got their chance. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2891"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2892"></td>
        <td id="LC2892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2893"></td>
        <td id="LC2893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3080"></td>
        <td id="LC3080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already assembled. There were no doors off this landing, but Ron nudged Harry and pointed at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3081"></td>
        <td id="LC3081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ceiling, where there was a circular trapdoor with a brass plaque on it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3082"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3083"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3084"></td>
        <td id="LC3084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3085"></td>
        <td id="LC3085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As though in answer to his question, the trapdoor suddenly opened, and a silvery ladder </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3086"></td>
        <td id="LC3086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">descended right at Harry’s feet. Everyone got quiet. </td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3090"></td>
        <td id="LC3090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He emerged into the strangest-looking classroom he had ever seen. In fact, it didn’t look like a </td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC3094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were all closed, and the many lamps were draped with dark red scarves. It was stiflingly warm, </td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lavender trembled. </td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3451"></td>
        <td id="LC3451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hasn’ — hasn’ anyone bin able ter open their books?” said Hagrid, looking crestfallen. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3546"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC3547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good man, Harry!” roared Hagrid. “Right then — let’s see how yeh get on with Buckbeak.” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3548"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3636"></td>
        <td id="LC3636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermione ran to hold open the gate as Hagrid lifted Malfoy easily. As they passed, Harry saw </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3637"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3822"></td>
        <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron had spent the last quarter of an hour carefully shredding his own roots into exactly equal </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pieces. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>
        <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now” said Snape in his most dangerous voice. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>

        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>
        <td id="LC4101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one moved in yesterday afternoon, and I asked the headmaster if the staff would leave it to give </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>
        <td id="LC4102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my third years some practice. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4103"></td>
        <td id="LC4103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4104"></td>
        <td id="LC4104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So, the first question we must ask ourselves is, what is a Boggart?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4105"></td>
        <td id="LC4105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4106"></td>
        <td id="LC4106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione put up her hand. </td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4195"></td>
        <td id="LC4195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4196"></td>
        <td id="LC4196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His first thought was Lord Voldemort — a Voldemort returned to full strength. But before he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>
        <td id="LC4197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had even started to plan a possible counterattack on a Boggart- Voldemort, a horrible image came </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4198"></td>
        <td id="LC4198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">floating to the surface of his mind. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4385"></td>
        <td id="LC4385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why would anyone bother looking after them?” said Ron, after yet another hour of poking </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5042"></td>
        <td id="LC5042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5698"></td>
        <td id="LC5698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And?” he said, dreading the answer. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5699"></td>
        <td id="LC5699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5700"></td>
        <td id="LC5700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, you know the Whomping Willow,” said Ron. “It — it doesn’t like being hit.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5701"></td>
        <td id="LC5701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5702"></td>
        <td id="LC5702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Professor Flitwick brought it back just before you came around,” said Hermione in a very small </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5703"></td>
        <td id="LC5703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5704"></td>
        <td id="LC5704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5705"></td>
        <td id="LC5705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Slowly, she reached down for a bag at her feet, turned it upside down, and tipped a dozen bits of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5706"></td>
        <td id="LC5706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">splintered wood and twig onto the bed, the only remains of Harry’s faithful, finally beaten </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5707"></td>
        <td id="LC5707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broomstick. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5708"></td>
        <td id="LC5708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5709"></td>
        <td id="LC5709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5710"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5711"></td>
        <td id="LC5711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER TEN </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5712"></td>
        <td id="LC5712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5713"></td>
        <td id="LC5713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5714"></td>
        <td id="LC5714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Marauder’s Map </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5715"></td>
        <td id="LC5715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5716"></td>
        <td id="LC5716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madam Pomfrey insisted on keeping Harry in the hospital wing for the rest of the weekend. He </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5717"></td>
        <td id="LC5717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">didn’t argue or complain, but he wouldn’t let her throw away the shattered remnants of his </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5718"></td>
        <td id="LC5718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nimbus Two Thousand. He knew he was being stupid, knew that the Nimbus was beyond repair, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5719"></td>
        <td id="LC5719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but Harry couldn’t help it; he felt as though he’d lost one of his best friends. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5720"></td>
        <td id="LC5720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5721"></td>
        <td id="LC5721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had a stream of visitors, all intent on cheering him up. Hagrid sent him a bunch of earwiggy </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5722"></td>
        <td id="LC5722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flowers that looked like yellow cabbages, and Ginny Weasley, blushing furiously, turned up with </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5723"></td>
        <td id="LC5723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a get-well card she had made herself, which sang shrilly unless Harry kept it shut under his bowl </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5724"></td>
        <td id="LC5724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of fruit. The Gryffindor team visited again on Sunday morning, this time accompanied by Wood, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5725"></td>
        <td id="LC5725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who told Harry (in a hollow, dead sort of voice) that he didn’t blame him in the slightest. Ron </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5726"></td>
        <td id="LC5726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Hennione left Harry’s bedside only at night. But nothing anyone said or did could make </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5727"></td>
        <td id="LC5727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry feel any better, because they knew only half of what was troubling him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5728"></td>
        <td id="LC5728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5729"></td>
        <td id="LC5729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He hadn’t told anyone about the Grim, not even Ron and Hennione, because he knew Ron would </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5730"></td>
        <td id="LC5730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">panic and Hennione would scoff. The fact remained, however, that it had now appeared twice, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5731"></td>
        <td id="LC5731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and both appearances had been followed by near-fatal accidents; the first time, he had nearly </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5732"></td>
        <td id="LC5732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been run over by the Knight Bus; the second, fallen fifty feet from his broomstick. Was the Grim </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5733"></td>
        <td id="LC5733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to haunt him until he actually died? Was he going to spend the rest of his life looking over </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5734"></td>
        <td id="LC5734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his shoulder for the beast? </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5735"></td>
        <td id="LC5735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5736"></td>
        <td id="LC5736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then there were the Dementors. Harry felt sick and humiliated every time he thought of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5737"></td>
        <td id="LC5737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. Everyone said the Dementors were horrible, but no one else collapsed every time they </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5738"></td>
        <td id="LC5738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went near one. No one else heard echoes in their head of their dying parents. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5739"></td>
        <td id="LC5739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5740"></td>
        <td id="LC5740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Because Harry knew who that screaming voice belonged to now. He had heard her words, heard </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5741"></td>
        <td id="LC5741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them over and over again during the night hours in the hospital wing while he lay awake, staring </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5742"></td>
        <td id="LC5742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the strips of moonlight on the ceiling. When the Dementors approached him, he heard the last </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5743"></td>
        <td id="LC5743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moments of his mother’s life, her attempts to protect him, Harry, from Lord Voldemort, and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5744"></td>
        <td id="LC5744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Voldemort’s laughter before he murdered her. . . Harry dozed fitfully, sinking into dreams full of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5745"></td>
        <td id="LC5745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clammy, rotted hands and petrified pleading, jerking awake to dwell again on his mother’s voice. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5746"></td>
        <td id="LC5746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5747"></td>
        <td id="LC5747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a relief to return to the noise and bustle of the main school on Monday, where he was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5748"></td>
        <td id="LC5748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forced to think about other things, even if he had to endure Draco Malfoy’s taunting. Malfoy was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5749"></td>
        <td id="LC5749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost beside himself with glee at Gryffindor’ s defeat. He had finally taken off his bandages, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5750"></td>
        <td id="LC5750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and celebrated having the full use of both arms again by doing spirited imitations of Harry falling </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5751"></td>
        <td id="LC5751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off his broom. Malfoy spent much of their next Potions class doing Dementor imitations across </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5752"></td>
        <td id="LC5752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dungeon; Ron finally cracked and flung a large, slippery crocodile heart at Malfoy, which hit </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5753"></td>
        <td id="LC5753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him in the face and caused Snape to take fifty points from Gryffindor. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5754"></td>
        <td id="LC5754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5755"></td>
        <td id="LC5755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If Snape’s teaching Defense Against the Dark Arts again, I’m skiving off,” said Ron as they </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5756"></td>
        <td id="LC5756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">headed toward Lupin’s classroom after lunch. “Check who’s in there, Hennione.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5757"></td>
        <td id="LC5757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5758"></td>
        <td id="LC5758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5759"></td>
        <td id="LC5759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5760"></td>
        <td id="LC5760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hermione peered around the classroom door. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5761"></td>
        <td id="LC5761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5762"></td>
        <td id="LC5762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s okay!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5763"></td>
        <td id="LC5763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5764"></td>
        <td id="LC5764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Lupin was back at work. It certainly looked as though he had been ill. His old robes </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5765"></td>
        <td id="LC5765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were hanging more loosely on him and there were dark shadows beneath his eyes; nevertheless, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5766"></td>
        <td id="LC5766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he smiled at the class as they took their seats, and they burst at once into an explosion of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5767"></td>
        <td id="LC5767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complaints about Snape’s behavior while Lupin had been ill. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5768"></td>
        <td id="LC5768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5769"></td>
        <td id="LC5769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s not fair, he was only filling in, why should he give us homework?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5770"></td>
        <td id="LC5770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5771"></td>
        <td id="LC5771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We don’t know anything about werewolves — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5772"></td>
        <td id="LC5772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5773"></td>
        <td id="LC5773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“ — two rolls of parchment!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5774"></td>
        <td id="LC5774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5775"></td>
        <td id="LC5775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Did you tell Professor Snape we haven’t covered them yet?” Lupin asked, frowning slightly. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5776"></td>
        <td id="LC5776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The babble broke out again. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5777"></td>
        <td id="LC5777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5778"></td>
        <td id="LC5778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, but he said we were really behind — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5779"></td>
        <td id="LC5779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5780"></td>
        <td id="LC5780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“ — he wouldn’t listen — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5781"></td>
        <td id="LC5781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5782"></td>
        <td id="LC5782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“ — two rolls of parchment]” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5783"></td>
        <td id="LC5783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5784"></td>
        <td id="LC5784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Lupin smiled at the look of indignation on every face. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5785"></td>
        <td id="LC5785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5786"></td>
        <td id="LC5786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don’t worry. I’ll speak to Professor Snape. You don’t have to do the essay.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5787"></td>
        <td id="LC5787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5788"></td>
        <td id="LC5788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh no,” said Hermione, looking very disappointed. “I’ve already finished it!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5789"></td>
        <td id="LC5789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5790"></td>
        <td id="LC5790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had a very enjoyable lesson. Professor Lupin had brought along a glass box containing a </td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5974"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5975"></td>
        <td id="LC5975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6901"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing,” said Hermione in a lofty voice, heaving her bag back over her shoulder. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7460"></td>
        <td id="LC7460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7741"></td>
        <td id="LC7741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7742"></td>
        <td id="LC7742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh no,” said Lupin. “Much worse than that. You can exist without your soul, you know, as long </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7743"></td>
        <td id="LC7743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as your brain and heart are still working. But you’ll have no sense of self anymore, no memory, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7744"></td>
        <td id="LC7744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no... anything. There’s no chance at all of recovery. You’ll just exist. As an empty shell. And </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7745"></td>
        <td id="LC7745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your soul is gone forever. . . lost.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7746"></td>
        <td id="LC7746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7747"></td>
        <td id="LC7747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lupin drank a little more butterbeer, then said, “It’s the fate that awaits Sirius Black. It was in </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7748"></td>
        <td id="LC7748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Daily Prophet this morning. The Ministry have given the Dementors permission to perform it </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7749"></td>
        <td id="LC7749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if they find him.” </td>

        <td id="LC7833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron approached her table and at last, she looked up. </td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8017"></td>
        <td id="LC8017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry shouldered the Firebolt and he and Ron walked out of the shadowy stadium, discussing the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8018"></td>
        <td id="LC8018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Firebolt’ s superbly smooth action, its phenomenal acceleration, and its pinpoint turning. They </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8485"></td>
        <td id="LC8485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for somebody to let him in, while the security trolls leered unpleasantly at him. None of these </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8486"></td>
        <td id="LC8486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punishments, however, came close to matching the one his grandmother had in store for him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8487"></td>
        <td id="LC8487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8488"></td>
        <td id="LC8488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two days after Black’s break-in, she sent Neville the very worst thing a Hogwarts student could </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8489"></td>
        <td id="LC8489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive over breakfast — a Howler. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8490"></td>
        <td id="LC8490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8491"></td>
        <td id="LC8491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The school owls swooped into the Great Hall carrying the mail as usual, and Neville choked as a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8492"></td>
        <td id="LC8492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">huge barn owl landed in front of him, a scarlet envelope clutched in its beak. Harry and Ron, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8493"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8494"></td>
        <td id="LC8494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from his mother the year before. </td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC8499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sprinted out of the hall, while the Slytherin table exploded with laughter at the sight of him. They </td>

        <td id="L8500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8500"></td>

        <td id="L8577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8577"></td>
        <td id="LC8577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8578"></td>
        <td id="LC8578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hagrid, we should’ve helped as well — sorry — ” Harry began awkwardly. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8860"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8955"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC9976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10353"></td>
        <td id="LC10353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, Ron, please let’s move, they’re going to do it!” Hennione breathed. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10354"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10357"></td>
        <td id="LC10357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They walked forward; Harry, like Hermione, was trying not to listen to the rumble of voices </td>

        <td id="L10358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10358"></td>
        <td id="LC10358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind them. Ron stopped again. </td>

        <td id="L10362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10362"></td>

        <td id="L10363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10363"></td>

        <td id="LC10377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry’s mind had gone blank with shock. The three of them stood transfixed with horror under </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry and Hennione almost fell over Ron; they skidded to a stop right in front of him. He was </td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10443"></td>

        <td id="L10444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10444"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10446"></td>
        <td id="LC10446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they’ll be coming back out in a minute — ” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10447"></td>
        <td id="LC10447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10635"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10729"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10730"></td>

        <td id="L10821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10821"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11104"></td>
        <td id="LC11104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11105"></td>
        <td id="LC11105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11106"></td>
        <td id="LC11106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But apart from my transformations, I was happier than I had ever been in my life. For the first </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11107"></td>
        <td id="LC11107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time ever, I had friends, three great friends. Sirius Black... Peter Pettigrew... and, of course, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11108"></td>
        <td id="LC11108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your father, Harry — James Potter. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11109"></td>
        <td id="LC11109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11110"></td>
        <td id="LC11110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, my three friends could hardly fail to notice that I disappeared once a month. I made up all </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11111"></td>
        <td id="LC11111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorts of stories. I told them my mother was ill, and that I had to go home to see her. . . I was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11112"></td>
        <td id="LC11112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrified they would desert me the moment they found out what I was. But of course, they, like </td>

        <td id="LC11113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, Hermione, worked out the truth. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11114"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11115"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11116"></td>
        <td id="LC11116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">transfonnations not only bearable, but the best times of my life. They became Animagi.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11117"></td>
        <td id="LC11117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11118"></td>
        <td id="LC11118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My dad too?” said Harry, astounded. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11119"></td>
        <td id="LC11119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11120"></td>
        <td id="LC11120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, indeed,” said Lupin. “It took them the best part of three years to work out how to do it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11121"></td>
        <td id="LC11121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Your father and Sirius here were the cleverest students in the school, and lucky they were, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11122"></td>
        <td id="LC11122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because the Animagus transformation can go horribly wrong — one reason the Ministry keeps a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11123"></td>

        <td id="LC11124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sirius. Finally, in our fifth year, they managed it. They could each turn into a different animal at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11125"></td>
        <td id="LC11125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11126"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11127"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11128"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11129"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11130"></td>
        <td id="LC11130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A werewolf is only a danger to people. They sneaked out of the castle every month under </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11131"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11132"></td>
        <td id="LC11132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Willow’s attacking branches and touch the knot that freezes it. They would then slip down the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11133"></td>
        <td id="LC11133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tunnel and join me. Under their influence, I became less dangerous. My body was still wolfish, </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC11134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but my mind seemed to become less so while I was with them.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11135"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11136"></td>
        <td id="LC11136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hurry up, Remus,” snarled Black, who was still watching Scabbers with a horrible sort of </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11137"></td>
        <td id="LC11137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hunger on his face. </td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11139"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11143"></td>
        <td id="LC11143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out more about the Hogwarts grounds and Hogsmeade than we did. . . And that’s how we came to </td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11145"></td>
        <td id="LC11145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">James was Prongs.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11147"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every time we sat down to plan our next month’s adventure. And I haven’t changed. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11164"></td>
        <td id="LC11164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11165"></td>
        <td id="LC11165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lupin’s face had hardened, and there was self-disgust in his voice. “All this year, I have been </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11166"></td>
        <td id="LC11166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">battling with myself, wondering whether I should tell Dumbledore that Sirius was an Animagus. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11167"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">betrayed his trust while I was at school, admitting that I’d led others along with me. . . and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11169"></td>
        <td id="LC11169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dumbledore’s trust has meant everything to me. He let me into Hogwarts as a boy, and he gave </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11170"></td>
        <td id="LC11170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me a job when I have been shunned all my adult life, unable to find paid work because of what I </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11171"></td>
        <td id="LC11171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am. And so I convinced myself that Sirius was getting into the school using dark arts he learned </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11172"></td>
        <td id="LC11172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Voldemort, that being an Animagus had nothing to do with it. . . so, in a way, Snape’s been </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11173"></td>
        <td id="LC11173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right about me all along.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11174"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11175"></td>
        <td id="LC11175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Snape?” said Black harshly, taking his eyes off Scabbers; for the first time in minutes and </td>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11179"></td>
        <td id="LC11179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron, and Hermione. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11180"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11181"></td>
        <td id="LC11181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Professor Snape was at school with us. He fought very hard against my appointment to the </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11182"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a trick which involved me — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11185"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11186"></td>
        <td id="LC11186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Black made a derisive noise. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11187"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11188"></td>
        <td id="LC11188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It served him right,” he sneered. “Sneaking around, trying to find out what we were up to. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11189"></td>
        <td id="LC11189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoping he could get us expelled. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11190"></td>
        <td id="LC11190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11191"></td>
        <td id="LC11191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Severus was very interested in where I went every month.” Lupin told Harry, Ron, and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11192"></td>
        <td id="LC11192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione. “We were in the same year, you know, and we — er — didn’t like each other very </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11193"></td>
        <td id="LC11193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much. He especially disliked James. Jealous, I think, of James’s talent on the Quidditch field. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11194"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11654"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11933"></td>

        <td id="L13153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13153"></td>
        <td id="LC13153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and smaller as Harry gazed after them. . . then a cloud drifted across the moon. . . They were gone. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L13241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13241"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13243"></td>
        <td id="LC13243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13244"></td>
        <td id="LC13244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13245"></td>
        <td id="LC13245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Really — they’ll wake everybody up! What do they think they’re doing?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13246"></td>
        <td id="LC13246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>
